mapper.select: select * from transaction_real where apt_code = #{aptCode} and type = #{type} order by year desc, month desc, day desc
select * from transaction_real where apt_name = #{aptName} and type = #{type} order by year desc, month desc, day desc
select * from public_office where ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{lng}, #{lat}), POINT(longitude, latitude)) <= 2000
select * from school where ST_Distance_Sphere(POINT(#{lng}, #{lat}), POINT(lng, lat)) <= 2000

select total, male, female, zero_male+zero_female as zero, ten_male+ten_female as ten, twenty_male+twenty_female as twenty, thirty_male+thirty_female as thirty, forty_male+forty_female as forty, fifty_male+fifty_female as fifty, old_male+old_female as old from population where bjd_code=#{bjdCode};
select dongName from dongcode where dongCode=#{bjdCode}
